mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Book(bookId, title, bookImage, author, publisher, bookIntro, bookCate, fullPrice, bookStock, discountPer, regDate, updateDate) VALUES(#{bookId}, #{title}, #{bookImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{bookIntro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookCate}, #{fullPrice}, #{bookStock}, #{discountPer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYSDATE, null)
